title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2813.3 - Application review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2813.3 - Application review

State Regulations
(a) All
applications will be given a file number, and logged in with date received, name of applicant, proposed region of operation and amount of funding
requested. (b) All applicants will
be sent an acknowldgement letter containing said file number which must be used
in all future correspondence. (c) Applications received after the deadline announced in the notice of funding
availability will be returned. Incomplete applications will be
returned. (d) All complete
applications will be reviewed for compliance with general eligibility
provisions of these regulations and article XVII of the Private Housing Finance

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2813.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
